section.title: Version
section.p: The current version is 0.7.2 (ALPHA). For changes since the first 0.5.0 release see here.
The integration should be tested further to assure that it is applicable to many different environments. Currently this release supports the features listed here, these features pass the testcases.

section.title: Todo
section.p: The following topics will be implemented in the near future:

ol.li: User defined collections/types (which extend the current EMF collections)
Automatic validation of persisted EMF objects at commit

section.p: The following topics will be covered later:

ol.li: Allow and retain manual changes in generated jdo files
Align the JDO/JPOX and Hibernate generated database schemas, facilitating switching or layer
More tests, For example on the area of jdo queries, different hierarchy mappings and performance

section.title: Next Steps
section.p: Integrating EMF with other tools such as:

ul.li: Other OR layers such as Versant
Frameworks such as the Java Content Repository
